item.title: TEN: Table Explicitization, Neurosymbolically
item.description: arXiv:2508.09324v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We present a neurosymbolic approach, TEN, for extracting tabular data from semistructured input text. This task is particularly challenging for text input that does not use special delimiters consistently to separate columns and rows.
